name: Localizedpadavan
body: localizedPadavan v0.4 This is for async language localization. - It uses rel property of html elements. - Reads & writes on json - On language change, language name stored on cookie so you can cache your json file with no problem. - You can give a cookie name to store your cookie or script will use default. - It'll have a stable admin interface on php (first), python, asp, ruby for you to implement easily but not right now. Actualy it's not hard to save & edit a json file with simple key value state. May be i can right a memcached or redis handler to read directly from cache but let's forget about it right now. Cause i'm a bit lazy so; You can find sample usage in langControl.php ```javascript ``` Beware of using on production right now! It's just a test and i'm working on it. Well, still ongoing project and not finished so do not complain till version 1.0... And I appreciate any comment from you so send a comment i'll try to fix it.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
